seloma ohk class in sessionwhen doing lobola negotiations, during the talks you have to divide cows according to three stages, the biggest one, middle and smaller, they ant all same size, biggest one may be r12k,middle r10k, smaller r8k, you see where am going with this🤷‍♂️
bobowataumanana advobarryroux in any culture lobola is not marriage, according to the whole customary law, lobola alone is not marriage if you break up after lobola was paid then no divorce is necessary but if it was followed by other african traditions then you would have to get a divorce
